about_the_game:
Project: Woven is a pixel platformer/RPG, following the story of a Robot who's main purpose is to free the World from its Corruption!

  • Explore a carefully crafted World full of unique areas filled to the brim with cheery and memorable characters!
  • A simple, but effective RPG battle system! Including Basic and Energy based Attacks!
  • Many different Bosses to fight and overcome, all with unique abilities that will test your skills!
  • Shops to further enhance your abilities and overall upgrade your Robot-self to be equipped to fight harder battles!
  • Tons of planned side content, including playable arcade machines and secrets!

You are a Robot named ROBI. You were created for the main purpose to save the World from the Corruption that is spreading. You will meet and befriend lots of interesting characters along the way, and battle your way through intense and quirky battles to fulfill your life goal!

name: Project: Woven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Very easy to run game!
